article_title: That was easy: Obama hammers Staples

article_metadata.description: The president says "shame on them" over Staples' policy to limit part-time workers to 25 hours, which keeps the company from having to provide health insurance.

og.description: The president says "shame on them" over Staples' policy to limit part-time workers to 25 hours, which keeps the company from having to provide health insurance.

... moreDuration: {{video.duration.momentjs}}
The president says "shame on them" over Staples' policy to limit part-time workers to 25 hours, which keeps the company from having to provide health insurance.
